NAME: Sagnik Nath
ABOUT:
Ever since I played Age of Empires, on a computer which would only be found in a museum today, I knew I wanted to code and be around computers and I have done so since i was 12 years old. I consider programming to be more art than science and its power to change the world continues to inspire me.

I started my career working at Microsoft's incredible Azure Big Data team where I spent upwards of 3 years working on a variety of projects ranging from possible the largest data migration ever undertaken to Geo Replication systems. Everything I know about large scale distributed systems and design is credits to the incredible people I have worked with here.

After Microsoft, I decided to join Rooter, which is a sports based social media platform, as the Head of Engineering, fulfilling a long time intent of working at an agile small scale startup and am poised to deliver the vision of rooter to become India's largest sports fan community.

Outside of work, I love to swim, read books,  and play blues and rock on my gorgeous Stratocaster. I find playing guitar to be the perfect creative outlet, complementing my left brain activities.
